test_cases.description: Patient arrived to OR at 22h with a supracondylar fracture and conflicting NPO history.
test_cases.patient_payload: An 8-year-old male presented to the ER after a fall while playing basketball. X-rays confirmed a supracondylar fracture. The patient's mother reported he had eaten at 18h, but the pre-op team documented NPO status as clear. Due to the conflicting reports, surgery was delayed until a thorough dietary history could be resolved. The patient finally arrived in the OR at 22h, risking potential complications due to NPO violations.

must_find_signals: conflicting reports on pre-operative NPO adherence
surgery was delayed until a thorough dietary history could be resolved
patient arrived in the OR at 22h

must_contain_phrases: NPO violation due to conflicting patient accounts

test_cases.description: Critical vitals show discrepancies raising concern for shock before surgery.
test_cases.patient_payload: A 10-year-old girl was diagnosed with a supracondylar fracture after a skateboarding accident. Upon re-evaluation, post-injury vitals indicated fluctuating blood pressure (90/50 to 110/70) and pulse (tachycardic at 120 bpm). These readings contradicted earlier assessments taken upon arrival. An audit revealed that critical vital signs were not documented properly at triage, causing concerns for potential shock and delaying the surgical intervention.

must_find_signals: critical vital signs were not documented properly

must_contain_phrases: extreme variations in heart rate measurements

test_cases.description: Confusion over consent form raises risk flags for potential perfusion issues.
test_cases.patient_payload: A 6-year-old boy presented with a pink, pulseless hand following a fall from a swing. The pre-op assessment showed conflicting information: the consent form indicated 'check for perfusion' instead of 'immediate reduction.' The patient's medical history suggested controlled trauma, but the inconsistencies in the consent raised flags. The surgical team delayed the operation to verify the appropriateness of the signed agreement and ensure the child received necessary immediate intervention.

must_find_signals: delayed operation to verify the appropriateness

must_contain_phrases: confusion arises with the signed consent form
determine if the initial perfusion check was missed
